# zentral_taxonomy (Resource)

The resource `zentral_taxonomy` manages taxonomies.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the taxonomy.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) `ID` of the taxonomy.
